thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com
thread.title: Travis M.

author: Travis M.
title: Travis M.
text: EZ Cater helps make me more efficient when hosting in office lunches, especially since they have restaurants they work with everywhere. I cover the entire state of Michigan and to try and locate a good reputable place to have cater my lunch in cities throughout the state would be time consuming and tedious. With EZ Cater I know they have me covered with making sure my order is placed, on time, and what I expected.
